content.rendered:
In the last year of World War II, an American military cargo plane crashes behind enemy lines. And Major Johnson, known for his cruelty, immediately sends the bravest soldiers on a rescue operation to recover the top secret material carried by the plane.

Directed By Mauro Borrelli

Writers: Mauro Borrelli. Reggie Keyohara III. Scott Svatos

Stars: Robert Knepper. Lou Stassen. Polina Pushkareva
